section.title: Provider Host
section.para: This agent does not perform any work by itself, but it serves as host for custom monitoring data providers.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: This agent is used as a base when you install a new custom agent. Depending on the template selected, the following configurations are available:

itemizedlist.listitem:
For the SQL template:
Username: used when logging in to the database system Password: used when logging in to the database system Database: name of the database to connect to Port: if needed, the port number of the database server. JDBCDriverClass: if needed, the name of the JDBC driver class. Classpath: if needed, the classpath to the JDBC driver jar.
For the Java template and for the Process template a set of generic parameters are provided. The meaning of each one can vary for different providers.

sect2.para: Please see for details on how to access these parameters from the provider.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Will contain the set of entities and counters returned by providers.
